title: "Beneficios De Citi" Is Recognized as Best Consumer Mobile App in the 2013 Latin American Digital Awards
summary: Miami, Fla. - IDG Latin America and PC World en español recognized the Beneficios de Citi mobile application as the Best Consumer Mobile App in Latin America during the 2013 Latin American Digital Awards.
tag-1: "Beneficios De Citi" Is Recognized as Best Consumer Mobile App in the 2013 Latin American Digital Awards
tag-2: Miami, Fla. – IDG Latin America and PC World en español recognized the Beneficios de Citi mobile application as the Best Consumer Mobile App in Latin America during the 2013 Latin American Digital Awards.
tag-3: Beneficios de Citi is a digital tool that gives Citi clients fast and easy access via their mobile devices to information about discounts and promotions from different retailers and Citi branch and ATM locations. It also features GPS location services, augmented reality and mapping functions, as well as alerts and links to social networks. The app is currently available in Argentina, Peru, Panama, El Salvador, Guatemala, Costa Rica and Venezuela, is coming soon to Brazil, Colombia, Nicaragua and Honduras and can be downloaded for free onto Android, Apple and Blackberry devices via Google Play, the App Store and Blackberry Store of each country.
tag-4: Jorge Ruiz, Citi's Digital Banking Head for Latin America, said, "We are honored to be recognized with this award. This was only possible thanks to our strong and trust-based relationships with our valued clients and to our team's commitment and continuous focus in offering unparalleled services and solutions to our clients in the markets where we operate."
tag-5: Organized by IDG, a leading technology media, events and research company, whose global brands include CIO® and PCWorld®, the 14th edition of the Latin American Digital Awards 2013 were announced and presented at the Latin American Digital Awards Grand Gala held in Miami on Friday, November 1.
tag-6: More than 300 products in nearly 50 categories made it to the final round of the awards. Winners were chosen by a judging panel who voted individually and confidentially on various criteria including technical and design characteristics, performance, price, warranties, instruction manuals, technical assistance and installation.
tag-7: "We continue committed to bringing the best digital capabilities to our clients in the region in the coming months," added Ruiz.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
